item.title: Cloudflare Workers Tech Talks #1 - Yusuke Wada
item.description: Yesterday, on July 19, I hosted an event called ”Workers Tech Talks #1” in Tokyo. It’s a developer meetup for developers by developers, particularly aimed at those interested in Cloudflare Workers.

item.title: Steam国産サバイバー系ローグライト『9th Sentinel Sisters』とは一体誰が作っていて、どういうコンセプトなのか。Live Wire

item.title: LANDrop - Drop any files to any devices on your LAN
item.description: Thanks for using LANDrop! LANDrop Organization doesn’t collect, share, or store any of your personal data. All personal data required for the normal operation of the app are stored entirely and exclusively on your device.

item.description: さて今年入社した新卒社員だとMVNO事業部の織さんの記事が初出になりますが、私もなにか書きたいなあと思い、新卒1年目ながら記事を執筆させて頂きました。
